resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75035</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>71cd6114-cae8-4f49-8b83-f634abc785dc#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Leképezés domború tükörrel</string>
            <string language="en">Forming with a convex mirror</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Formung mit einem konvexen Spiegel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formation avec un miroir convexe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dar forma com um espelho convexo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formando con uno specchio convesso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαμόρφωση με έναν κυρτό καθρέφτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación con un espejo convexo</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Gyertya és a domború tükörben látható képe</string>
            <string language="en">Candle and it's picture in a convex mirror</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">domború tükör,  képalkotás,  </string>
            <string language="en">convex mirror, image forming,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kerze und es sind Abbildung in einem konvexen 
Spiegel</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La bougie et c'est image dans un miroir convexe</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A vela e são retrato em um espelho convexo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La candela ed esso è immagine in uno specchio 
convesso</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το κερί και αυτό είναι εικόνα σε έναν κυρτό 
καθρέφτη</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La vela y es cuadro en un espejo convexo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">konvexer Spiegel, bildendes Bild,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">miroir convexe, image formant,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">espelho convexo, imagem que dá forma,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">specchio convesso, immagine che forma,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κυρτός καθρέφτης, εικόνα που διαμορφώνει,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">espejo convexo, imagen que forma,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>

              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:
org:IBCnet Magyarország Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>978</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>

    </identifier>
    <name>

    <item>
